reviews.review: The original Half-Life game rewritten on a new physics engine that fixes the elevator crushing bug, gives sharper, more detailed graphics and realistic sound, plus improved NPC AI. A huge improvement on the original Quake-engined game, which would be redundant had it not been necessary to have it loaded to play the gearbox extensions 'Blueshift' & 'Opposing Force'.

¿Que se puede decir? Es el mismo Half-life con la diferencia de que se ve poco mejor, no será la mejor remasterización pero conserva toda la esencia del original, así que es un sí definitivo.

I haven't beaten the game yet, but I find it just as fun as the Steam version of Half-Life in its regular iteration. I appreciate how this version reverts back to the pre-HD models, how certain sound effects are updated or from the original game, and of course, how the NPCs exhibit physics. 
The only bad thing I will say is that this version does have a few glitches. The most prolific is the barnacles' tongues can still snag you, even though they don't appear visible on the screen. The worst one I've come across is during the stage when you're riding conveyor belts after escaping the trash compactor, with graphical glitches obscuring the view of the screen. That's where I've stopped. Until this point, the game was a pleasant experience.

Half-Life: Source in einem Wort: Half Life.
Das Spiel wirkt exakt wie das Original. An der ein oder anderen Stelle kommt es mir jedoch so vor, als wären ein oder zwei Räume oder Jump and Run Situationen anders aufgebaut als im ursprünglichen Spiel. Was Half Life: Source evtl. interessanter macht, haut es jedoch an einer anderen Stelle wieder rein: Bugs. Und davon nicht zu wenig. Teilweise sind Level dank einiger Grafikbugs zu Ratespielen geworden. Dennoch ist das Spiel machbar und alles dies betreffend nur halb so wild. Genau so wie das Original ist Half-Life: Source ein Nostalgie-Kick zurück in Gordon Freemans Alien-Abenteuer. Empfehlenswert für alle Freunde von Alien-First-Person-Shootern. Dennoch würde ich mir dieses Spiel nicht gönnen, nachdem ich das Original gespielt habe. Das ist noch ähnlicher als Skyrim auf der PS3 und dann auf dem PC zu spielen.

毕竟是起源引擎的试水，也怪不了谁，要怪就怪Valve对这款游戏的定位。你一个重制版我除了感受到光源亮了些，部分贴图稍微清晰了一点，还有起源引擎的水的效果，我真没感受到跟原版有什么区别，虽然连引擎都换了，但我觉得连Remastered都算不上。连起源引擎最令人称道的物理引擎和布娃娃系统，出场几率也极其低。如果各位是想用半条命1的地图用SFM或者是gmod制作视频，那么它也是不错的选择。而且这个半条命起源玩到戈登被扔进垃圾处理机器那关有时候会满屏的贴图错乱，凳子上的科学家会悬空，这明显是直接原版半条命1直接套起源引擎，就是给大家展示起源引擎向下兼容性的一个demo而已，如果大家是想要玩到真正意义上的“重制”的话，试试《Black Mesa》

Go buy the origional version if you want to play Half-Life.

I bought this because the Half Life bundle was on sale. This game finished installing before the vanilla Half Life so I hopped right in to get things started. Everything was going just fine until the conveyor segment. It's hard to describe what was happening but it was so inexcusably buggy. It's not game breaking but I was disappointed when it happened. The only bugs I've come across are texture based. If you can look past those bugs then I'd say that Half Life Source is a neat little re-hash but I'm glad I got it when it was on sale. Based off of the other reviews they recommend the original Half Life and I would agree. If you had to choose, get the original. You're not missing out on too much.

Play the original or, if you want upgraded graphics, Black Mesa. This version is riddled with bugs and issues, and the graphical updates are minimal, if not distracting. The only real use for this is to get half-life 1 stuff in gmod. Other than that it should never be played.

Una historia maravillosa, en mi caso nunca he tenido la oportunidad de jugar al original y este la verdad que deja un poco que desear, las mejoras gráficas y los pequeños detalles se agradecen, pero la experiencia se enturbia bastante cuando aparecen bugs visuales o te quedas atrapado en las pantallas de carga (recomiendo guardar mucho). Esas cosas, restan mucho, sumado a pequeños bloqueos leves que si no te miras una guía o sabes por donde es, es practicamente imposible saberlo. Con todo eso, sigue siendo un gran juego, se nota que tiene una buena historia, unas mecánicas buenas y es normal que esta saga sea historia. 

Resumiendo: Si nunca has jugado Half-Life y quieres unos gráficos "modernos" te lo recomiendo, si en cambio has jugado al original, es lo mismo nada nuevo.

[h1]搜索：半衰期1代_高清重制
您要找的是不是：[b][i]《Black Mesa》[/i][/b]→ https://store.steampowered.com/app/362890/Black_Mesa/ [/h1]

HL1当然是毋庸置疑的神作，但这款不是。新玩家入坑记得避雷，这是原版《半衰期1》（金源引擎）于2004年发布的起源引擎重置版。想玩原汁原味的原版HL1？请出门左传搜原版《Half Life》。

毫无诚意的V社移植作品。和原版Half Life在建模、贴图方面没有一丝一毫的改进。如果说别的厂商炒冷饭好歹是“新瓶装旧酒”，这个《HL:S》居然只是把瓶身的旧标签撕下来贴个新的上去。可问题是，你贴了个新的标签上去，酒的口感反而还不如旧包装的（指暴力换引擎造成的各种致命性BUG、糟糕的操作手感等）。

如果你是难以忍受原版HL1上世纪的粗粝建模贴图转而寻找HL1的高清重制，你应该去搜民间制作组的史诗级良心重制版HL1：《Black Mesa》。《黑山》抛开了时代计算机机能差距，从美工层面同人吊打官方。

除了微乎其微地改善了HL1针对现代PC的兼容性外，这款HL:S唯一的作用也就只有服务GMOD制作者了。
